title: Manmohan Singh Education: Former PM Schooling, Colleges, Degrees and Academic Achievements
snippet: Dr. Manmohan Singh began his educational journey in Gah, a small village in Punjab (now in Pakistan). He attended the local primary school in his village.

title: CURRICULUM VITAE DR. MANMOHAN SINGH PRIME MINISTER OF INDIA ACADEMIC RECORD
What are the educational degrees of former Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh? - Quora
snippet: Manmohan Singh, the ex-Prime Minister of India had attended Punjab University, then in Hoshiarpur, Punjab, studying Economics and got his bachelor's and master's degrees in 1952 and 1954, respectively, standing first throughout his academic career.
